name: Game Test (TNCGamerYT)
description:
I'm making a short horror game and this here is just a test.The menu is a bit crappy but I will upgrade it when I'm almost finished.If anyone have any ideas to add to the game please check me on discord.This is my first game so don't judge me please.

Controls:

Movement with W,A,S,D and mouse.

Press esc to hide mouse.
